entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 30 April 2023
